Good Evening, 
I'm looking to sell the following, prices include shipping. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know at [url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]

Please see pictures for condition.  Front and back images can be found at: [url]http://s1065.photobucket.com/albums/u394/x2drich2000/[/url]


Orth (Southern League) - missing top - $25
Overall - SGC 20 - $30

Take remaining T206's for $50.

Please, also see my listing for E section for E93, M116, and a 1921 Exhibit Johnson. 

Thank you for looking,
DJ

UPDATE: Email sent on Niles & Carrigan.

Thanks,

Steve
Ill take the Murphy and the Stahl.
Received the Niles & Carrigan today. They look great, thanks!!

Bump

Down to the last two T206, take both for $50 dlvd.  

Thank you to everyone who has purchased cards so far.

DJ
